AboutCard.title: âš¡ Technical Approach
AboutCard.paragraph1: I am a Frontend developer specialized in React with experience in {tech}. I build high-performance, responsive, and accessible user interfaces with clean and reusable code.
AboutCard.paragraph2: I have experience with RESTful API integrations and have worked in Agile teams using tools like {tools}. I have over two years of experience in individual and team projects; I also contribute to open-source projects and continuously improve my skills.
AboutCard.paragraph3: I am analytical and problem-solving oriented; while creating user-friendly and sustainable solutions, I aim to advance my expertise in the React ecosystem and modern web technologies.

AboutMe.greeting: Hello! Iâ€™m Zeynep, a Software Developer. I enjoy combining code and design to quickly and effectively transform ideas into user-friendly interfaces.

ProjectApproach.title: Project Development Approach
ProjectApproach.paragraph1: I turn modern frontend approaches into practical projects and contribute to the open-source ecosystem. In particular, I aim to make developers' work easier by creating Next.js-based boilerplate structures and various supporting tools.
ProjectApproach.paragraph2: On my personal blog, I share frontend techniques, practical solutions, and project experiences, exchanging knowledge and insights with the community.

MyGoal.title: My Goals
MyGoal.content: I aim to progress as a senior frontend developer, taking responsibility in larger and more scalable projects while continuously improving myself.

Services.title: My Services
Services.content: I develop modern, fast, and scalable web applications with React and Next.js. If you want to make a technical contribution to your product or start a new project, you can reach me through the contact section.
